example.text: I stood alongside my Republican colleagues to send a clear message that Secretary Mayorkas must go and under a Republican majority, we will hold him accountable! I WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!

STATE OF THE UNION On Tuesday, President Biden gave his State of the Union address, taking a victory lap despite over 40% of Americans admitting that they're worse off under his leadership.
